P42STGBS.description: Feeling of closeness to a political party
P42STGBS.question: Do you feel close to any political party?

P43STGBS.A.description: Voting intention if elections were held this Sunday
P43STGBS.A.question: If elections were held this Sunday, which political party would you vote for?

P44ST.A.description: Frequency of political conversations with friends
P44ST.A.question: How often do you talk about politics with friends?

P44ST.B.description: Frequency of working on community problems
P44ST.B.question: How often do you work on a problem that affects you or your community?

P44ST.C.description: Frequency of trying to persuade others of political views
P44ST.C.question: How often do you try to convince others of your political views?

P44ST.D.description: Frequency of working for a political party or candidate
P44ST.D.question: How often do you work for a political party or candidate?

P45ST.A.question: Have you ever signed a petition, would you do it, or would you never do it?

P45S.B.question: Have you ever taken part in an authorized demonstration, would you do it, or would you never do it?

P45ST.C.question: Have you ever taken part in a non-authorized demonstration, would you do it, or would you never do it?

P45STN.D.question: Have you ever protested on social media, would you do it, or would you never do it?

P50ST.description: Channels for expressing opinions on national problems
P50ST.question: Where do you usually express your opinions about national problems, or do you not usually express them?

values.5: I usually do not express them

P47ST.question: What do you think one should do to help your country move forward?

values.2: One must vote and also protest
values.3: One must only protest — voting is no good
values.4: One must do nothing — neither vote nor protest
values.5: I do not know what to do

P49ST.description: Perceived risk of expressing political opinions
P49ST.question: If you express your opinions freely and publicly about national problems, do you think it could have negative consequences for you?
